ItemInfo.name: riskTableData-detection
ItemInfo.value: SELECT '' risKImg, t1.DataIndex dataIndex, t1.TowerID towerID, t2.TowerName towerName, t3.RiskName riskName, DATE_FORMAT(t1.RecordDate, '%Y-%m-%d') recordDate, t1.RiskLevel riskLevel, t4.ProvinceName provinceName, t4.AreaName areaName, t2.Location location, t1.AddressCode addressCode, t1.CheckDataIndex checkDataIndex, t1.DetectionDataIndex detectionDataIndex, t5.ConstractCode constractCode, 'detection' workOrderType FROM dw_tower_risk t1, dim_ne_tower t2, dim_risk t3, dim_geo_area t4, dw_tower_detection t5 WHERE t1.TowerID = t2.TowerID AND t1.RiskID = t3.RiskID AND t2.AreaID = t4.AreaID AND t1.RiskStatus = 0 AND t1.DetectionDataIndex = t5.DataIndex
ItemInfo.Property1: risKImg:图片,dataIndex:隐患ID,towerID:塔ID,riskName:隐患名称, recordDate:日期,areaName:地市, location:区县, addressCode:站址编码, riskLevel:隐患级别,checkDataIndex:巡检ID,detectionDataIndex:检测ID,provinceName:省

ItemInfo.name: riskTableData-check
ItemInfo.value: SELECT '' risKImg, t1.DataIndex dataIndex, t1.TowerID towerID, t2.TowerName towerName, t3.RiskName riskName, DATE_FORMAT(t1.RecordDate, '%Y-%m-%d') recordDate, t1.RiskLevel riskLevel, t4.ProvinceName provinceName, t4.AreaName areaName, t2.Location location, t1.AddressCode addressCode, t1.CheckDataIndex checkDataIndex, t1.DetectionDataIndex detectionDataIndex, t5.ConstractCode constractCode, 'check' workOrderType FROM dw_tower_risk t1, dim_ne_tower t2, dim_risk t3, dim_geo_area t4, dw_tower_check t5 WHERE t1.TowerID = t2.TowerID AND t1.RiskID = t3.RiskID AND t2.AreaID = t4.AreaID AND t1.RiskStatus = 0 AND t1.CheckDataIndex = t5.DataIndex

ItemInfo.name: gridData-check
ItemInfo.value:
SELECT t1.DataIndex ID,
CASE WHEN t6.CheckDataIndex IS NULL THEN 'repair' WHEN t6.CheckDataIndex = 0 THEN 'repair' ELSE 'check' END workOrderType, t6.DataIndex RiskID, t6.RiskName RiskName, DATE_FORMAT(t6.RecordDate, '%Y-%m-%d') RiskDate, t1.TowerID TowerID, t2.AddressCode AddressCode, t2.TowerName TowerName, t3.ProvinceName ProvinceName, t3.AreaName AreaName, t2.Location city, t1.constractCode constractCode, '' path FROM dw_tower_check t1 JOIN dim_ne_tower t2 ON t1.TowerID = t2.TowerID JOIN dim_geo_area t3 ON t2.AreaID = t3.AreaID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t4.DataIndex DataIndex, t4.CheckDataIndex CheckDataIndex, t4.RecordDate RecordDate, t5.RiskName RiskName FROM dw_tower_risk t4 JOIN dim_risk t5 ON t4.RiskID = t5.RiskID ) t6 ON t1.DataIndex = t6.CheckDataIndex WHERE t1.STATUS = 1
ItemInfo.Property1: ID:巡检ID/检测ID,workOrderType:类别,RiskID:隐患ID,RiskName:隐患名称,RiskDate:记录日期,TowerID:塔ID,AddressCode:站址编码,TowerName:站址名称,ProvinceName:省,AreaName:地市,city:区县,path:图片,constractCode:合同号

ItemInfo.name: gridData-detection
ItemInfo.value: SELECT t1.DataIndex ID, CASE WHEN t6.DetectionDataIndex IS NULL THEN 'repair' WHEN t6.DetectionDataIndex = 0 THEN 'repair' ELSE 'detection' END workOrderType, t6.DataIndex RiskID, t6.RiskName RiskName, DATE_FORMAT(t6.RecordDate, '%Y-%m-%d') RiskDate, t1.TowerID TowerID, t2.AddressCode AddressCode, t2.TowerName TowerName, t3.ProvinceName, t3.AreaName AreaName, t2.Location city,t1.constractCode constractCode, '' path FROM dw_tower_detection t1 JOIN dim_ne_tower t2 ON t1.TowerID = t2.TowerID JOIN dim_geo_area t3 ON t2.AreaID = t3.AreaID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t4.DataIndex DataIndex, t4.DetectionDataIndex DetectionDataIndex, t4.RecordDate RecordDate, t5.RiskName RiskName FROM dw_tower_risk t4 JOIN dim_risk t5 ON t4.RiskID = t5.RiskID ) t6 ON t1.DataIndex = t6.DetectionDataIndex WHERE t1.STATUS = 2
ItemInfo.Property1: ID:巡检ID/检测ID,workOrderType:类别,RiskID:隐患ID,RiskName:隐患名称,RiskDate:记录日期,TowerID:塔ID,AddressCode:站址编码,TowerName:站址名称,ProvinceName:省,AreaName:地市,city:区县,path:图片

ItemInfo.name: riskInfo
ItemInfo.value: SELECT t1.DataIndex DataIndex, t1.RiskPosition RiskPosition,t2.RiskName RiskName, t1.CheckDataIndex CheckDataIndex, t1.DetectionDataIndex DetectionDataIndex FROM dw_tower_risk t1 JOIN dim_risk t2 ON t1.RiskID = t2.RiskID WHERE RepairDateIndex is null AND TowerID = ? AND RepairResult = 0 AND RiskStatus = 1
ItemInfo.Property1: DataIndex:隐患ID,RiskPosition:隐患部位,RiskName:隐患名称,CheckDataIndex:巡检记录ID,DetectionDataIndex:检测记录ID

ItemInfo.name: grid-check
ItemInfo.value: SELECT t1.ConstractCode constractCode, DATE_FORMAT(t1.CheckDate, '%Y-%m-%d') dateTime, t2.AddressCode addressCode, t3.TypeName typeName, t2.TowerName towerName, t2.RiskLevel riskLevel, t2.CheckRiskCountA riskCountA, t2.CheckRiskCount-t2.CheckRiskCountA riskCountB FROM dw_tower_check t1 JOIN dim_ne_tower t2 ON t1.TowerID = t2.TowerID JOIN dim_type_tower_shape t3 ON t2.TowerShapeType = t3.TypeID WHERE t1.`Status` = 1
ItemInfo.Property1: constractCode:合同号,dateTime:下发日期,addressCode:站址编码,typeName:塔型,towerName:站址名称,riskLevel:隐患级别,riskCountA:严重隐患数量,riskCountB:一般隐患数量,

ItemInfo.name: grid-detection
ItemInfo.value: SELECT t1.ConstractCode constractCode, DATE_FORMAT(t1.DetectionDate, '%Y-%m-%d') dateTime, t2.AddressCode addressCode, t3.TypeName typeName, t2.TowerName towerName, t2.RiskLevel riskLevel, t2.DetectionRiskCountA riskCountA, t2.DetectionRiskCount-t2.DetectionRiskCountA riskCountB FROM dw_tower_detection t1 JOIN dim_ne_tower t2 ON t1.TowerID = t2.TowerID JOIN dim_type_tower_shape t3 ON t2.TowerShapeType = t3.TypeID WHERE t1.`Status` = 2

ItemInfo.name: grid-repair
ItemInfo.value: SELECT t1.ConstractCode constractCode, DATE_FORMAT(t1.UpdateDate, '%Y-%m-%d') dateTime, t2.AddressCode addressCode, t3.TypeName typeName, t2.TowerName towerName, t2.RiskLevel riskLevel, t2.DetectionRiskCountA + t2.CheckRiskCountA riskCountA, t2.DetectionRiskCount + t2.CheckRiskCount - t2.CheckRiskCountA - t2.DetectionRiskCountA riskCountB FROM dw_tower_repair t1 JOIN dim_ne_tower t2 ON t1.TowerID = t2.TowerID JOIN dim_type_tower_shape t3 ON t2.TowerShapeType = t3.TypeID WHERE t1.`Status` = 0
